about_the_game:
Welcome to the Dreeme Collaboration DLC!

Virtual Cottage recently celebrated its third birthday! Shortly after its release in 2020, the artist Dreeme contacted us and asked if we would like to use a few of his tracks for the project. Since we really enjoyed his music, we were happy to do so.

Now, after all these years, we asked Dreeme if he would like to compose an exclusive album consisting of 10 tracks for Virtual Cottage. We are incredibly happy that he agreed!

We are therefore very pleased to release the resulting work as a DLC for Virtual Cottage!

Best regards,

Simone & Josef
detailed_description:
Welcome to the Dreeme Collaboration DLC!

Virtual Cottage recently celebrated its third birthday! Shortly after its release in 2020, the artist Dreeme contacted us and asked if we would like to use a few of his tracks for the project. Since we really enjoyed his music, we were happy to do so.

Now, after all these years, we asked Dreeme if he would like to compose an exclusive album consisting of 10 tracks for Virtual Cottage. We are incredibly happy that he agreed!

We are therefore very pleased to release the resulting work as a DLC for Virtual Cottage!

Best regards,

Simone & Josef

short_description: For this DLC we've teamed up with Scottish music producer Dreeme, who composed an exclusive album consisting of 10 tracks for Virtual Cottage. With these relaxing beats, you can get rid of any unpleasant tasks.
